thread.title: Hallcrafts
thread.title_full: Matboard and More reviewed by Hallcrafts

author: Hallcrafts
title: Hallcrafts
text: Matboard and More delivered exactly what we ordered - top quality matboards expertly cut to our custom sizes. Matboard exceeded our expectations by getting our order right, providing top quality matboards, cutting the matboards to our needed sizes and furthermore delivering everything ahead of schedule! That never happens! Great product and wonderful service. In this day of retailers leaving customers high and dry, it is refreshing to find a company that actually delivers. Thanks.
